Goldsrc Viewer

About this:

This is a tool that will allow you to view most goldsrc maps and demos (essentially all main games except blue shift) in your web browser with the use of the hlviewer.js library kindly provided by skyrim on github. At the moment it only displays a one map with a demo but hopefully I will be able to expand functionality to allow the use of locally stored assets using the Filesystem Access API. Until then you can check out my github and enjoy this demo ðŸ™‚.


Controls:

To access free mode, click on the cog in the veiwer and select free.
Movement: WASD; ascend: Space; descend: C; fullscreen: F; exit: esc
